comment.author: 32123096@N00
comment._content: Edna Goodrich (born Bessie Edna Stevens; December 22, 1883 – May 26, 1972) was a prominent Broadway actress, Florodora girl, author, and media sensation during the early 1900s. At one point, she was known as one of America's wealthiest and best dressed performers. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edna_Goodrich
